setup_script_description: sets focus on the fifth cell of the second row in the grid
task: navigate to first cell of row in grid
specific_user_instruction: Navigate to the first cell of the current row in the grid.
output_assertions: Text of the column header ('Date') is conveyed
Text of the cell ('01-Jan-16') is conveyed
coordinates of the cell (column 1, row 2) are conveyed
